phrases: we discovered that seven years had passed in this world, Earthland.
I think I read a fairy tale about something like that a long time ago,
but never imagined I would go through the same experience.
I do not think I will ever forget our homecoming at Fairy Tail that night.
We drank, we sang, we danced,
raising a clamor as if to bury the seven-year-gap.
You can use Fire Magic too, Romeo?!
The temperature in the guild is going to rise up again!
I can produce cold flames, too!
Purple sticky flames, like my dad.
And weird smelling yellow flames, too.
Looks like you have got more of a range than your old man...
Where have I seen that magic before?
Do not tell my dad, but I have been going to Totomaru-sensei's magic class.
Is that what he is been up to?
I never did get to eat all the colors of his flames!
Maybe I will go with you next time!
Natsu-nii, you are a taboo subject.
To think, you would become the fourth Fairy Tail Master...
I was only, like, standing in for you.
You can have the position back right away.
It is more amusing this way, so keep going for the time being.
If that is what the previous Master decrees, then I will continue for a while...
I have got this indescribable feeling of disappointment...
I am the one who proposed!
We do not need to bring that up!
Incompetent as I am, I hope you will think well of me!
She is mixing up their lives with hers.
I drew how I pictured you grown up after seven years, Wendy.
Why am I wearing a loincloth?
I wonder if they have been worrying about us these seven years...
Exceed have a different sense of time than humans.
Seven years probably has not seemed that long for them.
Well, I hope that is the case...
E-Even if I get bigger, I am not going to get bigger there?
Are you dissatisfied with my drawing?
You have held out well these seven years, Kinana.
It is not like I have been holding out...
Did you... remember anything about your past?
But every once in a while, it is like someone whispers to me.
Saying, Let me hear your voice.
It is a very kind voice... like it knows me from long ago...
Well, it looks like the gang's all here.
Let me congratulate you with love on your homecoming, everyone!
Are you all safe and sound?
They may not have aged in seven years, but still...
Are you going to go back to being a boisterous guild?
Pegasus and Lamia were both a big help in the search for Tenroujima.
I guess we are in their debt now...
Pegasus has overtaken us, but we have got more powerful members.
After all, in these seven years,
Lamia Scale has become the number two guild in Fiore.
You really think that is possible?!
How can you even suggest that?!
Come, let us change the subject.
What is important is that everyone is safe.
I-Is this what they call love at first sight?!
He came right out with it!
I can tell, this is going to get really complicated!
She is got quite the imagination.
I found out I am Cana's dad!
Do something about that goofball face!
Could not they have dealt with this in a more dignified way?
I guess they do not intend to keep it a secret...
She looks exactly like you two.
It is as noisy as ever.
For us, about a week passed,
but for those who stayed here, seven long years have gone by.
When I think about how everyone was waiting for us all this time...
It feels like it is been forever since we have been back to the old house!
I am glad you are safe.
But your rent is something else.
If you do not pay up, you are not setting foot in this house!
The guild is in financial straits, too...
I chipped in to cover you when you were out.
And Fairy Hills deducted seven years' worth of rent...
We are all in the same boat.
That is longer than I can imagine.
Jet and Droy have changed, too.
Alzack and Bisca have a child!
Come to think of it, everyone was surprised about Cana and Gildarts, right?
That means I have not been in touch with him for seven years.
He is probably worried about me...
Maybe I will go see Dad.
This may be the first time I have ever thought I wanted to see him!
I-It is not to borrow money!
But the seven years we lost forced a blank reality on us, too.
Makarov-dono, the gathering of the Ten Saints is drawing near.
But before that, I would like to inform you about a certain guild.
You know two women, Ultear and Meldy, do not you?
I am never going to ride in a carriage again!
Why are you two tagging along?
We do not have any money!
Lucy, your papa knows a lot of delicious fish stories, right?
And I will not even know if he knows that'til I see him.
Anyway, you guys do not live in a rented house, right?
What are we going to do?!
I am looking for Jude Heartfilia...
He is a member here, is not he?
It pains me... to have to tell you this...
Jude-san passed away one month ago.
I am truly sorry for your loss.
This is what seven blank years...
My old man stinks to high heaven and he never shuts up!
My dad bugs the hell out of me, too!
Why does he have to be so annoying?!
I wish he would just hurry up and die already!
Hey, knock it off, you wenches!
How are we supposed to sense the mood of strangers?!
We were on our way anyway.
What is wrong with this guy?
Sorry for making you fuss over me...
I just was not prepared... to hear about my dad...
The last time I saw my father was in Acalypha...
I never loved him, even when I was kid.
That business with the Phantom Lord made it even worse...
But after what happened in Acalypha,
I had the feeling my relationship with my father could change.
It is just like him to lose his health from working too hard.
Yet the tears will not come...
I guess I really did not have feelings for...
I do not know how to put this,
but I do not think it is about whether you cry or not...
I am telling you, old man, there is nothing to discuss.
Pay us back the money we lent you and the slate will be wiped clean.
The Master of Twilight Ogre, Banaboster.
Easy for you to say, but as you know, we have a surprising lack of money.
Besides, one look at the account book shows
that there is obviously something odd about income and expenditures.
Are you accusin' me of something?!
We will pay back the money we borrowed along with legitimate interest...
And I am tellin' you to pay it back right now, you old fart!
Let us start by recalculating the interest.
You beat up five of my guys!
First, our debtors open up a can of whoop-ass on us
and then they do not pay what they owe, you are makin' our guild lose face here!
I came here today to talk about money,
but you want to bring honor into it, too?
We do not have money or honor, thanks to you!
That is how you want to play it, yes?
Seven years... of property damage to our guild
We are obliged to pay you back for all of that.
For seven years... you have made my brats suffer...
It makes me cry just to think about it...
It is a war you want?
Hey, I thought the idea was to talk it out...
Should have figured that would not fly...
Lookin' at this makes me feel like those seven years never went by.
It is like the good old days.
Were not you guys going to Acalypha with Lucy?
Are you up for a scrap?!
It will only make matters worse!
Even though I have not been here in seven years, it is not dusty at all...
I have been cleaning it every week.
Although several outfits have gone to the moths...
They were sent here every year on the same day.
One more was delivered this morning.
Although I do not know when you will read this note...
Much time has passed since I heard that you and your friends had disappeared.
Although I am very worried, I have faith in you.
You remind me so much of Layla.
You were born with many blessings.
I am sure you are safe.
I have faith that we will be able to meet again.
As for me, it looks like I will soon be
finalizing important business negotiations in the west.
I am busy, but each day is satisfying.
Every day, I think of you and Layla.
You are our pride and joy.
I want you to go down the route you strongly believe in.
And I want to see you again... as soon as I can.
Lucy, I always have and always will love you.
We have got a job for her.
The letter that arrived this morning came with seven years' worth of rent.
I suppose that is what you call a doting parent...
Then we are the only ones who do not have money for food?!
There is no time to stand around and chat!
We got to get to work!
We are going out on a job!
We will bring you back some Shirotsume dumplings!
But even so, we are going to live in this world!
There is going to be a dance?
It is a social event for adults.
I do not think you are ready for it yet, Natsu.
I bet they have got lots of delicious food, right?!
I am going to clean'them out!
You really are still a kid, Natsu.
I am an adult, so I am looking forward to dancing elegantly with Carla.
You do not have the guts to even ask her!
Well, I have never seen that side of you before!
